title: Memory Grid MAP Project and Collection submissions 2002
abstract: A collection of audiovisual works that capture the unique "memory" of a place.
description: A collection of audiovisual works that capture the unique "memory" of a place. In particular, screen based works that tell a personal story about a place, have a narrative that relates to the location or are collaborative projects from a community group in an area.
